Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Decision to assign a specific worker to a specific task.

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Decision to include a specific feature in a specific sprint.

Name: set_sprint_goal
Description: The objective description for a sprint.

Name: allocated_sprint_budget
Description: The amount of budget allocated to a specific sprint.

Name: team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a team.

Name: worker_availability
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available for project work in a given period.

Name: story_point_estimate
Description: The estimated complexity (in story points) for a user story.

Name: task_effort_estimate
Description: The estimated effort (in hours) for a task.
